questions.question: Choose the word most similar in meaning to 'ABDICATE'
questions.explanation: Abdicate means to renounce or relinquish a throne or power.

questions.question: Choose the word opposite in meaning to 'MAGNANIMOUS'
questions.explanation: Magnanimous means generous or forgiving, especially towards a rival or less powerful person. Opposite is petty.

questions.question: Identify the error: 'One of the students (A)/ have not (B)/ submitted their assignment (C)/ No error (D)'
questions.explanation: 'One of the students' is singular, so it should be 'has not' instead of 'have not'.
questions.solution: Subject-verb agreement: One of + plural noun + singular verb
